name: BurstIQ, Inc.
description: Developer of enterprise-level healthcare blockchain data platform designed to transact through a network of marketplaces for personalized products and services. The company's platform offers a HIPAA-compliant database that seamlessly leverages blockchain, advanced security, big data capabilities, and machine intelligence, enabling healthcare businesses and individuals to access, understand, and control their health data.
one_liner: Developer of enterprise-level healthcare blockchain data platform designed to transact through a network of marketplaces for personalized products and services. The company's platform offers a HIPAA-compliant database that seamlessly leverages blockchain, advanced security, big data capabilities, and machine intelligence, enabling healthcare businesses and individuals to access, understand, and control their health data.
